episode_summary: This episode of 'No Such Thing As A Fish' covers a range of fascinating topics including historical beard bans, the peculiarities of yawning, the surprising quietness of the Big Bang compared to a rock concert, and a near-disaster during the production of Toy Story 2.

facts.fact: Alexander the Great banned beards in battle to combat beard pulling.
Psychopaths don't experience contagious yawning like the rest of us.
The Big Bang was quieter than a Motorhead concert.
Pixar accidentally deleted Toy Story 2 halfway through making it.
